Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.12804591]Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=3.5 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli (MIC=20 µM).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=19 µM).EL4 T-lymphoma cells (MIC=14 µM).[Ref.27271216]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcuss aureus (MIC=6.25 μM), Staphylococcus epidermidis (MIC=3.13 μM), Bacillus subtilis (MIC=3.13 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli (MIC=25 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC=12.5 μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=12.5 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27271216] 100% hemolysis at 20 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.12804591]Display cytotoxic against L929 fibroblasts(LC50=20 μM);EL4 T-lymphoma cells(LC50=14 μM).[Ref.27271216]L929 cells:Cell viability is approximately 10% at the concentration of 6.25 μM.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria. Antifungal activity against C. albicans.
